result.eng: She asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ga: chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.orig: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.html: chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sí an ċeist i gcoṁairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.

result.eng: They remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ga: ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.orig: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.html: ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ponchtml: ba ċuiṁin leo na sagairt ag dul ó ḟeirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mbaile Átha cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mbaile Átha cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mbaile Áṫa cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.html: ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domhI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom ḃeiṫ i mo ẛagart nuair a ṫiocfaḋ ann doṁI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.ga: an bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairt
result.orig: An bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairt
result.html: an bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairtCan he be cured, father?
